SELECT d.* FROM( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rNum, A.VISITOR_ID visitorId, IF(A.ACCESS_PATH='M','모바일','PC') AS accessPath, A.VISITOR_NM visitorNm, A.ITRSTD_CAR_TY itrstdCarTy, A.TEL_NO telNo, A.OVERLAP_CNT overlapCnt, A.DEL_YN delYn, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') regDt, (SELECT C.ASR_CONTENTS FROM VISITOR_SURVEY_MPPG B INNER JOIN SURVEY_ASR C ON (C.ASR_ID = B.ASR_ID) WHERE B.VISITOR_ID = A.VISITOR_ID AND B.QTN_ID = 'QTN-000000') AS answer1, (SELECT C.ASR_CONTENTS FROM VISITOR_SURVEY_MPPG B INNER JOIN SURVEY_ASR C ON (C.ASR_ID = B.ASR_ID) WHERE B.VISITOR_ID = A.VISITOR_ID AND B.QTN_ID = 'QTN-000001') AS answer2, (SELECT C.ASR_CONTENTS FROM VISITOR_SURVEY_MPPG B INNER JOIN SURVEY_ASR C ON (C.ASR_ID = B.ASR_ID) WHERE B.VISITOR_ID = A.VISITOR_ID AND B.QTN_ID = 'QTN-000002') AS answer3 FROM VISITORS A
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC ) d WHERE d.rNum BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM VISITORS A
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM VISITORS WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{lastIndex}

SELECT A.VISITOR_ID visitorId, IF(A.ACCESS_PATH='M','모바일','PC') AS accessPath, A.VISITOR_NM visitorNm, A.ITRSTD_CAR_TY itrstdCarTy, A.TEL_NO telNo, A.OVERLAP_CNT overlapCnt, A.DEL_YN delYn, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') regDt FROM VISITORS A WHERE A.TEL_NO = #{telNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VISITORS ( VISITOR_ID, ACCESS_PATH, VISITOR_NM, ITRSTD_CAR_TY, TEL_NO, OVERLAP_CNT, DEL_YN, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{visitorId}, #{accessPath}, #{visitorNm}, #{itrstdCarTy}, #{telNo}, #{overlapCnt}, 'N', NOW() )
INSERT INTO VISITOR_SURVEY_MPPG ( MPPG_ID, VISITOR_ID, QTN_ID, ASR_ID, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{mppgId}, #{visitorId}, #{qtnId}, #{asrId}, NOW() )
